answers.answer: i think if you are being induced you have to be in the hospital. But your husband can be there with you. (At least where i'm from)
You have to be in a hospital to be induced..
They can do a non medicated induction and let you labor at home.

question: I have gestational diabetes and have been talking with my midwife and consultant about being induced a bit early.. What I forgot to ask was if you are induced, are you allowed to labour at home or do you have to stay in hospital?? I spent 3 days in hospital last week and hated being on my own at night without my husband.. I don't want to have to stay in at night while in labour without him :-(
title: induction
